author: craigmcc
msg: Remove URL decoding of the entire request URI.  This conforms with the
required RFCs, as well as the "errata" to the 2.2 servlet spec that says
getRequestURI() should return a value that has *not* been decoded.
Currently, Tomcat 4.0 does not decode any of the path components -- there
is an ongoing discussion in the servlet experts group to clarify what the
final rules will be regarding what gets decoded and when (i.e. before you
do the mappings or after).  Once final resolution of these issues is
reached, any needed changes for the required behavior will be done.

author: craigmcc
msg: URL decode the names and values of query parameters as they are being
